Params: {3: 'Aside from the soul-crushing pain, this is what Lee remembers most vividly from being turned into a Construct.'}
{3: "To this day, Lee still remembers the day he was turned into the Construct he is now at Kurono's lab—which, unlike the trial area at the Science Council, was a dark, cold lab in the basement."}
{3: "People at the lab told him that he would be mankind's long-awaited hero if the experiment turned out successful."}
{3: 'Lee, however, knew better than to take what they said seriously.'}

{3: "The Construct Tech developed behind the scenes at the cost of countless lives, their plans, and mankind's hope—Lee cared about none of these. All he ever really wanted was for people he cared about to live a safe life going forward."}
{3: "Lee wasn't the first one to have participated in the project—from where he was, he could even see the poor souls before him immersed in the pods around his, their bodies pale and motionless."}

{3: 'Those bodies—hooked up to innumerable wires—were anything but "human." They have been disassembled and reassembled, only at the end to either be used or discarded, erasing every last bit of human dignity they might have had.'}
{3: 'A few lost causes tainted the floor with their vital fluid trying to crawl their way out of the lab in their broken body.'}
{3: "Lee was glad that he wasn't yet in that state when Murray last saw him as a human."}
{3: 'He thought he was going to carry on fighting forever as a tool—until someone came along and told him that they saw Constructs as "indispensable partners."'}
{3: 'Lee thought it was just another lie, but the person made a promise and lived up to the promise.'}
{3: 'Which is why Lee never wants his commandant to see him when he goes through the tests or be burdened with concerns about potential risks.'}
{3: 'While the rest of Gray Raven is fighting on the ground, so, too, is Lee fighting a battle of his own.'}
{3: "He's going to solve everything—and all that the rest of Gray Raven has to do is wait for him to go back a changed man, so they can all go on missions again like they have so many times before."}
{3: "Seeing Murray grow up healthy had always been Lee's only hope, but he now has another, having joined Gray Raven."}
{3: 'Lying down in the experiment pod, Lee picks up a cable and inserts it into the port in his neck like he has so many times.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Let's skip virtual bridging this time and dive straight into battle simulation with the new frame.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov points at the new frame—which lies in the pod.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Instead of the standard compatibility data, we'll be using your own data today...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'To see if what happened before is going to happen again.', 4: '1'}
{1: '>>>> Please enter the activation parameter for temporary authorization for frame switch', 2: '0e70bdff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg', 6: '1', 7: '1'}
